item.description:
Soils & Building Soil Health with Permaculture - get ready for this year's growing season!

This month we will have a 30-45 minute presentation from one of our group members, Dan Franek, who teaches on this very topic at SMCC. We will follow with a group discussion of how to build soil health with permaculture principles (review what you know and/or look at some of your permaculture resources to prepare for this, if desired).

Plus - come prepared for our "ice-breaker" - name the most important thing you are personally doing to live more sustainably right now.

Preceded by the requisite potluck, of course!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Portland Maine Permaculture February Meetup
